title: Zerodha Clone
description: Built a full-stack Zerodha clone using the MERN stack with user authentication, dashboard, and trading-like UI for practice and learning purposes.

title: Beam Call
description: Built a video conferencing app using MERN stack and WebRTC with peer-to-peer calling, real-time socket communication, and secure media streaming.

title: Rate my Store
description: A full-stack web application that allows users to submit ratings for stores registered on the platform.Built with Express.js, React, and PostgreSQL.
